description:
template: add doc.go to Makefile

The template package is the only one that has a doc.go not mentioned
in its Makefile.

This doesn't seem to bother godoc, but seems like a bug to me.

$ for d in $(find pkg -name doc.go); do echo $d; grep doc.go $(dirname $d)/Makefile; done
pkg/fmt/doc.go
        doc.go\
pkg/go/doc/doc.go
        doc.go\
pkg/gob/doc.go
        doc.go\
pkg/html/doc.go
        doc.go\
pkg/old/template/doc.go
        doc.go\
pkg/sync/atomic/doc.go
        doc.go\
pkg/template/doc.go

messages.text:
Hello r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=f835b80d1304 ***

This doesn't seem to bother godoc, but seems like a bug to me.

subject: code review 5003047: template: add doc.go to Makefile
